RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUCK OF THE DRAW raced up inside to the front, led to the half, dueled into far turn and held sway to the wire. CONGRATS THIS tracked from inside to far turn, ran on in the stretch, coming on. LOOKS GOOD N A TUX four wide run first turn while close to the stretch for show spot. FULCO tried to keep up to the half, gave in from the far turn, stretch. TORNADO BOY never factored throughout while off rail. DRAFT CAPITAL unhurried to far turn and never factored in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Congrats This
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked from inside to far turn, ran on in the stretch, coming on

ENTRY.NAME: Luck of the Draw
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced up inside to the front, led to the half, dueled turn, held

ENTRY.NAME: Draft Capital
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to far turn and never factored in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Fulco
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up to the half, gave in from the far turn, stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Tornado Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: never factored throughout while off rail

ENTRY.NAME: Looks Good N a Tux
ENTRY.COMMENT: four wide run first turn while close to the stretch for show spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FINGERS sharp to the front to set all pace under good handling while ridden out to the wire. KOBE BEACH no speed to the turn, ran on in the stretch for place no match. FLOYD G bit tardy at the start with no speed to the stretch, rallied along inside for show spot. FAST ROY chased winner to the stretch, gave in readily in late going. KING T'CHALLA off rail trip while never a real menace throughout. PASION AZTECA never menaced throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Floyd G
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tardy from gate, rallied along inside for show spot late

ENTRY.NAME: Fingers
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp to the front to set all pace under good handling ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Pasion Azteca
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Roy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to the stretch, gave in readily in late going

ENTRY.NAME: Kobe Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn, ran on in the stretch for place no match

ENTRY.NAME: King T'challa
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail trip while never a real menace throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1 1/16M Turf CR: 88. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $20,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $25,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since June 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming Races For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $16,000) . (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DISTINCTIVE FLOWER sharp speed to the front, set all pace while well handled throughout and held sway to the finish. MISS MOON PIE pressed winner to the half, chased to no avail, holding place. ADDISON raced along evenly throughout while keeping the show spot on wire. DANCE THE DAY AWAY no speed to far turn with a late run in the stretch to improve. BRITTLE AND YOO raced evenly from inside with no late response when needed. AUNT RUTH inside run to far turn, angled out into stretch with no late gain. ALMADRINA (GB) through early from inside, stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Brittle and Yoo
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced evenly from inside with no late response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Dance the Day Away
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn with a late run in the stretch to improve

ENTRY.NAME: Aunt Ruth
ENTRY.OWNER: Riley Barbara Ouzts Toni and Mattingly David H
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to far turn, angled out into stretch with no late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Almadrina (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: S B Stables LLC and Thorough Crowd
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early from inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Addison
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly throughout while keeping the show spot on wire

ENTRY.NAME: Distinctive Flower
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp speed to the front, set all pace well handled, held sway

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Lowell F. Allen & W. John Bourke

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Moon Pie
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed winner to the half, chased to no avail, holding place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAKE CHARGE CHLOE just off leaders from outside to turn, took over, ran clear while best to the wire. WRITTEN CONSENT inside speed early on, surrounded into turn, came back on. KINGMAKING (GB) inside trip to turn, chased through the stretch, faltered late. AWESOME VALOR brief speed off rail to turn, gave in readily in the stretch run. SATIS had a steady fade throughout. LADY BIRD KISSES always trailed, throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Written Consent
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed early on, surrounded into turn, came back on

ENTRY.NAME: Kingmaking (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip to turn, chased through the stretch, faltered late

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Bird Kisses
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed, throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Satis
ENTRY.COMMENT: had a steady fade throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Valor
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed off rail to turn, gave in readily in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Take Charge Chloe
ENTRY.OWNER: Blackleaf Farms LLC and Davis Raymond L
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leaders from outside to turn, took over, ran clear, best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 18000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since June 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AZURE SKY perfect position to far turn, roused past quarter pole, edged off under stout handling to the finish. NAVY CROSS inside spot to duel early on, took up chase, led stretch, nailed. FAST FALL speed to the front dueled early on, cleared off, weakened stretch. RUN RUN RAPIDASH raced along evenly with no late response in the stretch run. DAWN WEST off rail trip to far turn with no late kick in the stretch run. SUPER BROTHER always trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Navy Cross
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside spot to duel early on, took up chase, led stretch, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Azure Sky
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: perfect position to far turn, roused past quarter pole, edged off

ENTRY.NAME: Dawn West
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail trip to far turn with no late kick in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Super Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Run Run Rapidash
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late response in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Fall
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva Silver Lining Racing LLC Tennant Angela Tennant Kurt and 4C Sons LL
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front dueled early on, cleared off, weakened stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1M Turf CR: 92. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Ove r Since June 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than$ 15,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AUTHORITARIAN good speed to the front, well rationed throughout, kept clear. AMENDED good position to far turn, ran on in the stretch while no match. LEAVE IT TO KITTEN no speed to far turn, rallied along for show spot. PERFECT PAINTING off rail run from far turn to improve in late going, moved up. DRIFTWOOD never a real menace throughout. J W RUCKUS chased to far turn, between horses into stretch, no late kick. EDEN PARADISE inside run first turn, could not keep up and faded back. CORNER OFFICE through after half, dropped back readily.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since June 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Claiming Races For $5, 000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $6,500).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CALTHA saved ground throughout, got through into stretch, ran away late. OFF THE CHARTS speed to the front, stayed to the stretch, could not hang on. SUM KINDA PRETTY chased leader to far turn, could not go on, fading to third spot. MORNING LINE NEWS raced along evenly with no late response when needed stretch. APRIL'S NO FOOL off rail trip throughout with no response from far turn. I LIKEM always trailed throughout in a dull effort.

ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, stayed to the stretch, could not hang on

ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout, got through into stretch, ran away late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 69. Allowance Purse 25600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRICELESS PICTURE rated well just off leaders, rallied along late three wide and held sway to the wire under good handling. DENIABLE bobbled at the start, lagged back to turn, widest stretch missed. TWENTY FOUR KARAT inside chase to turn, took over into stretch, weakened from rail. MISS ELIANA raced along evenly with no late response in the late going. STORM OF NINETEEN speed to the front from inside to the turn, gave in readily late.

ENTRY.NAME: Storm of Nineteen
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front from inside to the turn, gave in readily late

ENTRY.NAME: Deniable
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled at the start, lagged back to turn, widest stretch missed

ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late response in the late going

ENTRY.NAME: Twenty Four Karat
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside chase to turn, took over into stretch, weakened from rail

ENTRY.NAME: Priceless Picture
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated well just off leaders, rallied along late three wide, held

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 9 1M Turf CR: 81. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Reg istered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $15,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZING no speed to far turn, kicked into gear approaching the quarter pole in full stride, rallied along outside in the stretch run to edge away late under stout handling to the wire. MIDNIGHTMAKESSENSE good position throughout, stayed game in stretch run but outkicked settling for place spot. SPRING MAGIC speed to the lead, kept to stretch run, stayed determined late. SWEET BABY RAY raced along evenly with no response in the final furlong. FREE TIME saved ground to far turn, in tight, angled out with no gain late. FORTUNE BOUND no speed to far turn while passing tired ones in the stretch. LAVISH HABITS no speed to far turn, while improving in the stretch run. HELENS WELL (IRE) raced along evenly with no late response when needed far turn. CHICA CHULA raced back throughout with no late action when needed. IT FACTOR tried to keep up for a half with nothing left from that point. MY HEAD HURTS chased pace to the half with a steady fade from far turn. RUNAWAY WILLIE broke sharp inside, never menaced throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Spring Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the lead, kept to stretch run, stayed determined late

ENTRY.NAME: Helens Well (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late response when needed far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Runaway Willie
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp inside, never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Chica Chula
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back throughout with no late action when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Baby Ray
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no response in the final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Free Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to far turn, in tight, angled out with no gain late

ENTRY.NAME: Lavish Habits
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, while improving in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Midnightmakessense
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position throughout, stayed game in stretch run outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Fortune Bound
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn while passing tired ones in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: It Factor
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up for a half with nothing left from that point

ENTRY.NAME: Zing
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, kicked into gear, rallied along, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: My Head Hurts
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to the half with a steady fade from far turn
